name: RoboEscape_V1
description:
Hi, I'm Marcus this is my FIRST game that I'm publishing  hope you like it and yes there are a LOT of bugs please leave down any questions or Feedback in the comments.

FUTURE UPDATES COMING SOON

DONATIONS WILL NOT BE TAKEN NOW CAUSE IM to young :/

Controls

WASD(For movement)+ Mouse(Aiming and Shooting) Space(Jumping)

Goal

You're goal Is defeat all Enemies to move on to the next wave BUT your health slowly drains away. So make sure you get your health back. 

"Bro how do you play this?? this isn't like fortnite" -Dave
